did.unittitle: General Linen Supply and Laundry Company, Inc. records
did.abstract: Records contain General Linen Supply and Laundry Company, Inc. financial records (1925), photocopy of correspondence regarding finances and a business card (1933), and a 75th anniversary press release from the Cascade Laundry, a division of General Linen Supply and Laundry Company, Inc. (1973).

origination.corpname: General Linen Supply and Laundry Company, Inc.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use note
userestrict.p: Financial records and press release are in the public domain. Correspondence will enter the public domain in August 2053.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); General Linen Supply and Laundry Company, Inc. records, 1987.025, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Cascade Laundry, a division of General Linen Supply and Laundry Company, Inc., was founded in 1898. Its plant was located at 835 Myrtle Avenue (at Marcy Avenue), in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn. The plant closed in 2010.
